item.description:
The theme for June is Oil Slick.

Plan to be in the back yard if the weather is kind to us. We'll have two charcoal grills going.

We'll be back at my place for June.

I've got a game for you. Start with Oil slick and do word associations up to 20 that circle round and end with Oil Slick. The connections should be obvious (with minimal hints from you as to the connections if it is a cultural reference - pop or otherwise). Don't over think this.

Here's mine....

1. Oil slick
2. Grace Slick
3. Jefferson Starship
4. Starship enterprise
5. Star trek
6. William Shatner
7. Travel
8. Europe
9. Euro
10. Greece
11. Grease , the musical
12. Grease is the Word
13. Bird is the word
13A. Bird Bird
13B. Bird is the word
14. Family Guy
15. Peter
16. Drink the beer - http://www.entertonem...
17. Drink wine
18. Spill the wine - http://popup.lala.com...
19. Oil spill
20. Oil slick
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes Monthly dinner Meetup
